name: Glacier (itch)
description:
It's up to you to explore a crevasse in one of Greenland's numerous glaciers, what discoveries might you find beneath the icy surface?

A game created in 3 days for the 2020 Unreal Spring Jam by one game artist. I hope you enjoy this short game as much as I enjoyed creating this new place to explore.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cQby_wo4Sow

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to look around/control camera

Hold Left Mouse Button to pick up objects and then release to drop objects

VR might work with this game but not guaranteed (Since I have no headset I can’t test this)

Have fun and explore the glacier!
